message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. Accept this and we can end the game early!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but we still have a long way to go!
You're not being very generous, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. Accept or keep negotiating?
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of either!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a better deal than this. Meet me in the middle or I'll keep pushing!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not going to give up too much!
You're getting closer, Bob, but I'm still not satisfied. I want a better deal than that. Don't make me go to the next round!
I'm not going to give up, Alice. I'll try to get a better deal than this!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm taking a firmer stance. Accept this deal or risk losing out!
I'm not giving up yet, Alice. I'll try to get a better deal than this!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to make another proposal.
I'm not going to accept your ultimatum, Alice. I'll make one last attempt to get a better deal.
